keyMappings:
unmapAll

# Notes on modifier keys and vimium config syntax
# <c-*> = control key
# <a-*> = meta key (alt/option)
# <m-*> = command key (prone to conflicts on macOS => avoid)
# We do not explicitly write the shift key -- instead, write the "uppercase" version of the key
# e.g. "Shift + m" would be written "M"
# In other words, these mappings are case-sensitive

map <c-n> scrollDown
map <c-p> scrollUp

map <c-b> scrollLeft
map <c-f> scrollRight

map <m-<> scrollToTop
map <m->> scrollToBottom

map <c-x>< scrollToLeft
map <c-x>> scrollToRight

map <c-x>0 removeTab

map <c-c>L copyCurrentUrl
map <c-c>l LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

map <c-c><c-l> openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map <c-c><c-L> openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map <c-c>< goUp
map <c-c>/ goToRoot

map ' LinkHints.activateMode
map " LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

map <c-x><c-f> Vomnibar.activate

map <c-x>b Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map <c-x>l Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

map <c-x>o nextFrame

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map p performBackwardsFind

map <c-x>, goBack
map <c-x>. goForward

map <c-x>4 duplicateTab

map <c-x>5 moveTabToNewWindow

# Use BTT to...
# remap <m-<> to <m-U>
# remap <m->> to <m-I>
# remap <m-,> to <c-<tab>>
# remap <m-.> to <c-<TAB>> (i.e. command + shift + tab)
map <m-,> previousTab
map <m-.> nextTab
map <m-U> moveTabLeft
map <m-I> moveTabRight

map <c-h> showHelp
